mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (reg_time, update_time, notice_contents, notice_title, status) VALUES (now(), now(), #{Not.noticeContents}, #{Not.noticeTitle}, "Y");
mapper.select: SELECT notice_id, notice_title, notice_contents, date_format(reg_time, "%Y-%m-%d") as reg_time, date_format(update_time, "%Y-%m-%d") as update_time FROM notice

update.if: UPDATE notice SET notice_contents = #{Not.noticeContents}, notice_title = #{Not.noticeTitle}, update_time = now() WHERE notice_id = #{Not.id}
